name: Soul Crushing
description:
What do ghost hunters become when they die? Turns out, not always ghosts! It's no big deal though, this zombified ghost hunter didn't even WANT to be a ghost, and he certainly doesn't feel left out at all (this is a lie).

Play as a zombie ghost hunter who takes out his frustration on some ghastly ghouls. Illuminate the ghosts with the light of your trusty lantern! Just make sure you remember where they are when you take a swing.

WASD - Move

J - Light attack

K - Heavy attack

L - Activate lantern

Rodrigo Okamoto Corbellini Pereira - Programming

Alex Hanlin - Programming + squelch sound

Alex Huang - Art + Technical Art

Jasmine Hanlin - Music , SFX + portraits

AI Portraits - https://ai-art.tokyo/en/
